attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the BBC demonstrating by its cavalier attitude with regard to its standards, and the extravagant fees paid to its executives and presenters, the Govenment should introduce the following changes to the BBC licence fee. At present the licence fee pays for all BBC broadcasting. In future the funding from the licence fee should be made available to the BBC solely for the following pruposes, the provision of
News and current affairs
Education
Childrens TV
The World sevice and TV equivalent
Historical and Natural history
By doing this the BBC would be forced to use advertising revenue for any other programming that it felt was necessary. The advertisers would exert far more editorial control than the BBC has currently been proven to have and the BBC will perhaps again become the service it once was. At the same time, the licence fee payer will relieved of paying ridiculous sallaries to those who sometimes have demonstrated their gutter standards and arrogance toward their employers ie the gerneral public.
